articles.title: Boeing was supposed to start flying astronauts for NASA 2 years ago. Now its glitching spaceship may not do so until 2023. - Business Insider South Africa
articles.description: Boeing's Starliner spaceship has failed to reach the International Space Station twice. Now it likely has to wait at least a year to fly astronauts.
articles.content:
Boeing may not fly astronauts for NASA until 2023 - more than three years after it was originally scheduled to do so.
Technical issues and delays have beset Boeing's spaceship development for years.… [+4078 chars]
